title: Xi urges creating level playing field for sci-tech enterprises of all countries
content:
Aerial photo taken on April 4, 2020 shows the Atlantis resort in Sanya, south China's Hainan Province.  (Xinhua/Zhang Liyun)
BEIJING, Nov. 21 (Xinhua) -- Chinese President Xi Jinping on Saturday urged creating a level playing field for scientific and technological enterprises of all countries.
